trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Configure Security Alerts
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Configure Security Alerts

trans-unit.source: Learn how toc configure security alerts for Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.
trans-unit.target: Learn how toc configure security alerts for Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.

trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Configure Security Alerts
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Configure Security Alerts

trans-unit.source: Security Alerts Overview
trans-unit.target: Security Alerts Overview

trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management offers the following alerts which can be configured.
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management offers the following alerts which can be configured.

trans-unit.source: Security Alerts can be viewed in the Alerts section of the PIM dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Security Alerts can be viewed in the Alerts section of the PIM dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Alert
trans-unit.target: Alert

trans-unit.source: Trigger
trans-unit.target: Trigger

trans-unit.source: Permanent activation attack suspected
trans-unit.target: Permanent activation attack suspected

trans-unit.source: An administrator activated its temporary role outside of PIM.
trans-unit.target: An administrator activated its temporary role outside of PIM.

trans-unit.source: Suspicious activation renewal of privileged roles
trans-unit.target: Suspicious activation renewal of privileged roles

trans-unit.source: There were too many re-activations of the same role with the time allowed in the settings.
trans-unit.target: There were too many re-activations of the same role with the time allowed in the settings.

trans-unit.source: Suspicious usage of honey token Global administrator user
trans-unit.target: Suspicious usage of honey token Global administrator user

trans-unit.source: The usage of a “honey pot” user was detected.
trans-unit.target: The usage of a “honey pot” user was detected.

trans-unit.source: Weak authentication is configured for role activation
trans-unit.target: Weak authentication is configured for role activation

trans-unit.source: There are roles without MFA in the settings.
trans-unit.target: There are roles without MFA in the settings.

trans-unit.source: Redundant administrators increase your attack surface
trans-unit.target: Redundant administrators increase your attack surface

trans-unit.source: There are temporary administrators that didn’t activate their roles within the number of days in the settings.
trans-unit.target: There are temporary administrators that didn’t activate their roles within the number of days in the settings.

trans-unit.source: Too many global administrators increase your attack surface
trans-unit.target: Too many global administrators increase your attack surface

trans-unit.source: There are more global administrators than allowed in the settings.
trans-unit.target: There are more global administrators than allowed in the settings.

trans-unit.source: Configuring Security Alerts
trans-unit.target: Configuring Security Alerts

trans-unit.source: Configure the "Suspicious activation of renewal of privileged roles" Alert
trans-unit.target: Configure the "Suspicious activation of renewal of privileged roles" Alert

trans-unit.source: From the **Activity** section of the dashboard, select **Security alerts**.
trans-unit.target: From the **Activity** section of the dashboard, select **Security alerts**.

trans-unit.source: The **Active security alerts** blade will appear.
trans-unit.target: The **Active security alerts** blade will appear.

trans-unit.source: Click **Settings**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Settings**.

trans-unit.source: Set the **Activation renewal timeframe** by adjusting the slider or entering the number of minutes in the text field.
trans-unit.target: Set the **Activation renewal timeframe** by adjusting the slider or entering the number of minutes in the text field.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number allowed is 100.
trans-unit.target: The maximum number allowed is 100.

trans-unit.source: Set the **Number of activation renewals** within the activation renewal timeframe by adjusting the slider or entering the number of renewals in the text field.
trans-unit.target: Set the **Number of activation renewals** within the activation renewal timeframe by adjusting the slider or entering the number of renewals in the text field.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of renewals is 100.
trans-unit.target: The maximum number of renewals is 100.

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: Configure the "Redundant administrators increase your attack surface" Alert
trans-unit.target: Configure the "Redundant administrators increase your attack surface" Alert

trans-unit.source: From the **Activity** section of the dashboard, select **Security alerts**.
trans-unit.target: From the **Activity** section of the dashboard, select **Security alerts**.

trans-unit.source: The **Active security alerts** blade will appear.
trans-unit.target: The **Active security alerts** blade will appear.

trans-unit.source: click **Settings**.
trans-unit.target: click **Settings**.

trans-unit.source: Select the number of days allowed without role activation by adjusting the slider or entering the number of days in the text field.
trans-unit.target: Select the number of days allowed without role activation by adjusting the slider or entering the number of days in the text field.

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**
trans-unit.target: Click **Save**

trans-unit.source: Configure the "Too many global administrators increase your attack surface" Alert
trans-unit.target: Configure the "Too many global administrators increase your attack surface" Alert

trans-unit.source: This alert has two settings that may trigger the alert.
trans-unit.target: This alert has two settings that may trigger the alert.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of Global Administrators will trigger the alert if there are more than the allowed number of administrators.
trans-unit.target: The minimum number of Global Administrators will trigger the alert if there are more than the allowed number of administrators.

trans-unit.source: If the percentage of global administrators in the total amount of types of administrators is higher than the percentage in the settings, the alert will also be triggered.
trans-unit.target: If the percentage of global administrators in the total amount of types of administrators is higher than the percentage in the settings, the alert will also be triggered.

trans-unit.source: From the **Activity** section of the dashboard, select **Security alerts**.
trans-unit.target: From the **Activity** section of the dashboard, select **Security alerts**.

trans-unit.source: The **Active security alerts** blade will appear.
trans-unit.target: The **Active security alerts** blade will appear.

trans-unit.source: click **Settings**.
trans-unit.target: click **Settings**.

trans-unit.source: Set the **Minimum number of Global Administrators** by adjusting the slider or entering the number in the text field.
trans-unit.target: Set the **Minimum number of Global Administrators** by adjusting the slider or entering the number in the text field.

trans-unit.source: Set the **Percentage if Global Administrators** by adjusting the slider or entering the number in the text field.
trans-unit.target: Set the **Percentage if Global Administrators** by adjusting the slider or entering the number in the text field.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps
